meanings.definition: A type of eraser used to remove pencil marks.
meanings.sent1: I always keep a rubbers in my pencil case to fix mistakes.
meanings.sent2: The teacher handed out rubbers to the students during the test.
meanings.sent3: When the rubbers disappeared from the classroom, everyone blamed the mischievous squirrel.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a worn-out rubbers, fading with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The rubbers worked like magic, making the pencil marks disappear effortlessly.

meanings.definition: A type of waterproof shoe cover.
meanings.sent1: Before going out in the rain, she put on her rubbers to keep her shoes dry.
meanings.sent2: The children splashed in puddles wearing their bright yellow rubbers.
meanings.sent3: The rubbers made her feet look like they belonged to a giant duck.
meanings.sent4: His determination was like a pair of sturdy rubbers, protecting him from the storm of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The rubbers were a lifesaver during the unexpected downpour, keeping her feet warm and dry.
